    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AdminController
    Controller class to handle administrative actions related to movies, showtimes, and bookings.
    Booking
    Represents a ticket booking made by a member for a particular showtime.
    BookingController
    Controller responsible for managing the booking process including seat selection, booking creation, booking history display, and booking cancellation.
    BookingFormDto
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing the booking form submitted by a user when selecting seats and optionally a ticket type for a specific showtime.
    BookingRepository
    Repository interface for managing Booking entities.
    BookingService
    Service class responsible for managing movie ticket bookings.
    BookingStatus
    Enumeration representing the possible statuses of a booking.
    ChangePasswordDto
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) for changing a user's password.
    DataSeeder
    Component responsible for seeding initial data into the database upon application startup.
    Hall
    Represents a cinema hall within the movie booking system.
    HallRepository
    Repository interface for managing Hall entities.
    HallService
    Service class responsible for managing halls and their seats.
    HallType
    Enumeration representing the types of cinema halls.
    HomeController
    HomeController is responsible for handling the root URL ("/") of the application.
    JpaUserDetailsService
    Service implementing Spring Security's UserDetailsService interface.
    Member
    Represents a member or user of the movie booking system.
    MemberController
    Controller that handles member-related actions such as login, registration, and password changes.
    MemberRepository
    Repository interface for managing Member entities.
    MemberService
    Service class for managing member-related operations such as registration, password changes, and retrieval by email.
    Movie
    Represents a movie entity in the system.
    MovieBookingAppApplication
    The entry point for the Movie Booking Application.
    MovieController
    Controller responsible for displaying movie information and associated showtimes.
    MovieRepository
    Repository interface for managing Movie entities.
    MovieService
    Service class to manage movie-related operations such as retrieval and status updates.
    RatingCategory
    Represents the rating category of a movie, which indicates the minimum age required to view the movie.
    RegistrationDto
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) for user registration form.
    Seat
    Represents a seat within a cinema hall.
    SeatRepository
    Repository interface for managing Seat entities.
    SeatService
    Service class for managing seat-related operations such as retrieval and conflict checking.
    SeatUnavailableException
    Custom exception thrown when a selected seat is no longer available during the booking process.
    SecurityConfig
    Spring Security configuration class for the Movie Booking Application.
    Showtime
    Represents a specific movie screening (showtime) in a cinema.
    ShowtimeCollisionException
    Custom exception thrown when a showtime conflict occurs during creation or update.
    ShowtimeDto
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) for transferring showtime data.
    ShowtimeRepository
    Repository interface for managing Showtime entities.
    ShowtimeService
    Service class for managing showtime operations such as creation, update, retrieval, and conflict checking for movie showtimes in halls.
    TicketType
    Enum representing the types of tickets available for booking.
